problemStory.heading: When waste disposal falls to the community‚Ä¶
problemStory.intro: Many small-island & coastal communities lack regular collection. Improvised solutions burden environment, health and livelihoods.

burning.title: Open burning
burning.text: Small fires are the last resort: smoke with fine particles and toxic by-products pollutes air and surroundings.

dumps.title: Open dumps
dumps.text: Unsecured dumps near settlements and waters are flushed by rain; plastics spread and some reach the sea via rivers.

fuel.title: High fuel prices
fuel.text: Long transport routes, small import volumes and extra handling steps drive local energy prices in island markets ‚Äî supply is costly and unreliable.

problemStory.transition: We replace self-disposal with local recovery ‚Äì turning plastic into clean fuel.

basola.title: BASOLA
basola.text: Collect plastic locally, recover it cleanly and provide fuel on-site. Less smoke, fewer dumps, more energy security.

team.heading: About Us
team.text: Our interdisciplinary team combines expertise in chemical and process engineering, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, and industrial engineering ‚Äî complemented by business and environmental perspectives. Together with seasoned advisors, we validate our technology, build prototypes, and test them in the field. Our goal is to spin off a startup that transforms non-recyclable plastics on site into local fuel ‚Äî technically robust, economically viable, and with measurable impact.
